dcterms:creator: Eric Brachmann
Frank Michel
Alexander Krull
Michael Ying Yang
Stefan Gumhold
dcterms:description: The LM-O dataset is a challenging subset of the Linemod dataset, containing 1214 images with around 8 objects annotated on each image, often heavily occluded.
dcterms:title: LM-O Dataset

dcterms:creator: Yu Xiang
Tanner Schmidt
Venkatraman Narayanan
Dieter Fox
dcterms:description: The YCB-V dataset is a large-scale dataset containing 21 objects and over 100k real images, often exhibiting occlusions and cluttered backgrounds.
dcterms:title: YCB-V Dataset

dcterms:creator: Stefan Hinterstoisser
Vincent Lepetit
Slobodan Ilic
Stefan Holzer
Gary Bradski
Kurt Konolige
Nassir Navab
dcterms:description: The Linemod dataset is used for model-based training, detection, and pose estimation of texture-less 3D objects in heavily cluttered scenes.
dcterms:title: Linemod Dataset
